context.introduction: Discover simple Korean dishes and the basics of banchan (side dishes). Learn about meal balance, classic soups, and mixed rice dishes.

sections.title: Banchan: Side Dishes
sections.content: Banchan are small side dishes served with Korean meals, adding variety and balance.

sections.title: Classic Soups
sections.content: Soups like doenjang jjigae and kimchi jjigae are staples in Korean cuisine, each with unique flavors.

sections.title: Mixed Rice Dishes
sections.content: Dishes like bibimbap combine rice, vegetables, and protein in one bowl for a balanced meal.

sections.title: Meal Tips
listItems: Serve a variety of banchan for balance
Mix rice dishes just before eating
